channel.title: How do you add objects like, where do i type the code
channel.description:
Sorry for posting this but I've tried looking for this everywhere and can't find the answer.
How do I add objects into my 317 server like for example a bank at the coords i have selected? Is it in client.java under makeGlobalObject? If so where do I type it lolz.
Thanks for your time. :)
*Edit*
Let me explain that again xD.
How do I add a bank booth into my server and I have the coords I want? I have a 317 server.
Soz, i also potsed in the wrong area

item.title: How do you add objects like, where do i type the code
item.dc:creator: @_The_killers -_The killers_-
item.description:
@_The_killers wrote:

[quote=“KingStripes, post:1, topic:317682”]Sorry for posting this but I’ve tried looking for this everywhere and can’t find the answer.

How do I add objects into my 317 server like for example a bank at the coords i have selected? Is it in client.java under makeGlobalObject? If so where do I type it lolz.

Thanks for your time.

Edit

Let me explain that again xD.

How do I add a bank booth into my server and I have the coords I want? I have a 317 server.

Soz, i also potsed in the wrong area[/quote]

go in your server search Client.java
search Ctrl+F

public void NewObjects

then makeGlobalObject(“Item Id”, “XCoord”, “YCoord”, 0, 10);

Remove that "
Enjoy

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add objects like, where do i type the code

item.title: How do you add objects like, where do i type the code
item.dc:creator: @xD3ad xD3ad
item.description:
@xD3ad wrote:

Yeah, you did. Copy one of the codes, change the coords X and Y and also change the item id. If not mistaken the item id is the last code. if thats wrong, try the first one.

Read full topic
